thread.section_title: lastminute.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of lastminute.com | www.lastminute.com
thread.title: Melissa Michelle Brock
thread.title_full: lastminute.com reviewed by Melissa Michelle Brock

author: Melissa Michelle Brock
title: Melissa Michelle Brock
text: STAY AWAY from lastminute.com I have been battling with them for over a year to get ticket credit which they initially "couldn't find" then we went back and forth from them calling me to make a booking over the phone to them "not receiving an answer' on my end-LIES. They never called when they claimed they had. I spent hours and money to call them from the U.S. to their Australian line, waiting on hold to be told I'd get a full refund to my credit card, and of course that never happened. They are now asking me to make a booking so I'll be refunded after. LIKE HELL. Please never use this site, they have cost me more than money, but time and so much stress.
